Address.label: Address
Address.value: 233 SOUTH PATTERSON AVENUE, SPRINGFIELD, Missouri, 65802, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: O'Reilly Automotive is one of the largest sellers of aftermarket automotive parts, tools, and accessories, serving professional and DIY customers (41% and 59% of 2021 sales, respectively). The company sells branded as well as own-label products, with the latter category comprising nearly half of sales. O'Reilly had 5,784 stores as of the end of 2021, spread across 47 U.S. states and including 25 stores in Mexico. The firm serves professional and DIY customers through its store network and also boasts approximately 750 sales personnel targeting commercial buyers.
